clinical_study.brief_title: Arbekacin Treatment of Adult Patients With Infections Caused by Multidrug-resistant Bacteria
clinical_study.official_title: Arbekacin Treatment of Adult Patients With Infections Caused by Multidrug-resistant Bacteria

lead_sponsor.agency: U.S. Army Medical Research and Materiel Command

collaborator.agency: Uniformed Services University of the Health Sciences

clinical_study.source: U.S. Army Medical Research and Materiel Command

brief_summary.textblock: The primary purpose of this protocol is to make arbekacin available for treatment of patients with infections caused by multidrug-resistant organisms when treatment with other antibiotics cannot be used due to unavailability, intolerance, contraindications, or treatment non-response.

intervention.description: Intravenous arbekacin in a total daily dose of 5-7 mg/kg
